languages.text: "Я решил, что не стоит лишний раз подвергать его операции: протокол, требовавший от него вести наблюдение, все равно остановлен. Может, однажды нам понадобится эта функция, но пока она деактивирована — и в бездну ее".

"I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."
languages.original_text: "Я решил, что не стоит лишний раз подвергать его операции: протокол, требовавший от него вести наблюдение, все равно остановлен. Может, однажды нам понадобится эта функция, но пока она деактивирована — и в бездну ее".

traits.locale_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that made him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might need this function sometime, but for now, it has been disabled — and to the warp with it."

"I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that made him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might need this function sometime, but for now, it has been disabled — and to the warp with it."

"I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the warp with it."

"I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

"I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

languages.text: 「彼にこれ以上の処置を施すのはやめることにしました。監視行動を取らせていたプロトコルも、すでに停止されていますから。いずれこの機能が必要になる日が来るかもしれません。ですが今は停止しています。そんなものは、どうでもいい」
languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

traits.locale_text: 「彼にこれ以上の処置を施すのはやめることにしました。監視行動を取らせていたプロトコルも、すでに停止されていますから。いずれこの機能が必要になる日が来るかもしれません。ですが今は停止しています。そんなものは、〈歪み〉の彼方にでも放り込んでしまえばいい」

languages.text: "Ich habe beschlossen, ihn nicht noch einer Operation auszusetzen – denn das Protokoll, das ihn dazu gebracht hat, die Überwachung durchzuführen, wurde ja deaktiviert. Vielleicht brauchen wir diese Funktion eines Tages noch, aber für den Moment ist sie stillgelegt – zur Leere mit ihr."
languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe beschlossen, ihn nicht noch einer Operation auszusetzen – denn das Protokoll, das ihn dazu gebracht hat, die Überwachung durchzuführen, wurde ja deaktiviert. Vielleicht brauchen wir diese Funktion eines Tages noch, aber für den Moment ist sie stillgelegt – zur Leere mit ihr."

languages.text: « J'ai décidé de ne pas le soumettre à une énième intervention. Le protocole correspondant à cette surveillance a été interrompu, après tout. Nous aurons peut-être un jour besoin d'utiliser cette fonction, mais pour le moment, elle est désactivée, par le vide ! »
languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai décidé de ne pas le soumettre à une énième intervention. Le protocole correspondant à cette surveillance a été interrompu, après tout. Nous aurons peut-être un jour besoin d'utiliser cette fonction, mais pour le moment, elle est désactivée, par le vide ! »

languages.text: «He decidido no someterlo a otra intervención; después de todo, el protocolo que le hacía espiar ya se ha interrumpido. Puede que algún día necesitemos esa función, pero de momento la he deshabilitado; y que el vacío se la lleve».
languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

traits.locale_text: «He decidido no someterlo a otra intervención; después de todo, el protocolo que le hacía espiar ya se ha interrumpido. Puede que algún día necesitemos esa función, pero de momento la he deshabilitado; y que el vacío se la lleve».

languages.text: “我不打算再让它接受类似的程序了，毕竟它的监视协议已经正式停止了。或许某天，我们可能得再次启用这个功能，但现在，这个功能已经彻底禁用了，让它滚蛋吧。”
languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算再让它接受类似的程序了，毕竟它的监视协议已经正式停止了。或许某天，我们可能得再次启用这个功能，但现在，这个功能已经彻底禁用了，让它滚蛋吧。”

languages.text: "Glatio'yu başka bir işleme daha tabii tutmamaya karar verdim. Sonuçta onu gözetim yapmaya zorlayan protokol durduruldu. Bir gün bu işleve ihtiyacımız olabilir ancak şimdilik devre dışı bırakıldı. Şimdilik uçsuza kadar yolu var."
languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."

traits.locale_text: "Glatio'yu başka bir işleme daha tabii tutmamaya karar verdim. Sonuçta onu gözetim yapmaya zorlayan protokol durduruldu. Bir gün bu işleve ihtiyacımız olabilir ancak şimdilik devre dışı bırakıldı. Şimdilik uçsuza kadar yolu var."

languages.original_text: "I've decided not to subject him to yet another procedure — the protocol that was making him conduct surveillance has been stopped, after all. We might have need of this function someday, but, for now, it has been disabled — and to the void with it."
